item.dc:creator: RENBO
item.content:encoded:
Loading...

Welcome！

The results only indicate your gender bias level, not your character. By participating, you're already taking a step towards addressing inequality.
Finally, thank you for your time and we hope you enjoy the questionnaire!


Please login to record you own experience

LOG IN

item.dc:creator: RENBO
item.content:encoded:
Do you know?

%

65% of people from the age group 35-40 have significant gender bias!


[smartslider3 slider="2"]

Welcome to GenderEqualizer, a platform for those aged 35-40. We aim to challenge gender biases by offering resources, assessments, and a community for support. Join us in promoting an inclusive mindset. Click the button below for a quick gender bias test.


You may want to know...

What is gender equality?


Read More

Why is gender equality so important?

Read More

What can I do to prevent gender bias?

Read More

Understanding Gender Equality

What can you do?

Log in to get further experience !

LOG IN

© 2023 GenderEqualizer. All rights reserved. - TP19

[{"id":"41d72174","elType":"section","settings":[],"elements":[{"id":"53f3c7f","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":100},"elements":[{"id":"3e6afedb","elType":"widget","settings":{"editor":"

Do you know?

There are 65% of individuals aged 35-40 who unknowingly harbor gender biases!


[smartslider3 slider="2"]



Learn More


Welcome to GenderEqualizer, a dedicated platform tailored for individuals aged 35-40. In today’s rapidly evolving world, it’s essential to address and challenge our inherent biases, particularly those related to gender. Our mission is to provide enlightening resources, interactive assessments, and a supportive community to help you recognize and combat gender biases. Whether you’re seeking knowledge, self-assessment, or a space to share and learn, we’re here to guide and support you on this enlightening journey towards a more inclusive mindset.

Please login to record you own experience

LOG IN

"},"elements":[],"widgetType":"text-editor"}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false}]

item.dc:creator: RENBO
item.content:encoded:
Your Bias Result

Skills Dashboard Childhood School Experience Relationship Behaviour Workplace Environment Equal Pay and Compensation Promotions and Opportunities Workplace Policies Try again

Your Gender Equality Assessment

-  Points farther from the center indicate higher bias.

  • C: Childhood
  • SE: School Experience
  • RB: Relationship Behaviour
  • WE: Workplace Environment
  • EPC: Equal Pay and Compensation
  • PO: Promotions and Opportunities
  • WP: Workplace Policies

Feedback and Suggestions

item.title: chatbot
item.dc:creator: RENBO
item.content:encoded:
<!-- wp:html -->
<script>

!(function () {
  let e = document.createElement("script"),
    t = document.head || document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0];
  (e.src =
    "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/rasa-webchat@1.0.1/lib/index.js"),
    // Replace 1.x.x with the version that you want
    (e.async = !0),
    (e.onload = () => {
      window.WebChat.default(
        { 
          initPayload: "/get_started",
          customData: { language: "en" },
          socketUrl: "https://fit5120tp19.site/",
          // add other props here
        },
        null
      );
    }),
    t.insertBefore(e, t.firstChild);
})();
</script>
<!-- /wp:html -->

item.dc:creator: RENBO
item.content:encoded:
Gender Decoder

View gender-coded words

  • "Masculine-coded" words resonate with male qualities.
  • "Feminine-coded" words resonate with female qualities.

×

Masculine-coded words

active- adventurous- aggress- ambitio- analy- assert- athlet- autonom- battle- boast- challeng- champion- compet- confident- courag- decid- decision- decisive- defend- determin- domina- dominant- driven- fearless- fight- force- greedy- head-strong- headstrong- hierarch- hostil- impulsive- independen- individual- intellect- lead- logic- objective- opinion- outspoken- persist- principle- reckless- self-confiden- self-relian- self-sufficien- selfconfiden- selfrelian- selfsufficien- stubborn- superior- unreasonab-

Feminine-coded words

agree- affectionate- child- cheer- collab- commit- communal- compassion- connect- considerate- cooperat- co-operat- depend- emotiona- empath- feel- flatterable- gentle- honest- interpersonal- interdependen- interpersona- inter-personal- inter-dependen- inter-persona- kind- kinship- loyal- modesty- nag- nurtur- pleasant- polite- quiet- respon- sensitiv- submissive- support- sympath- tender- together- trust- understand- warm- whin- enthusias- inclusive- yield- share- sharin-

Description

In our daily language, we often use gender-coded words unintentionally. Society has some inherent expectations for men and women that inadvertently seep into the language we use. Think “nosy” and “energetic”: words we almost never use to describe men.

This kind of gender coding in language also often appears in job ads, and research shows that women are less likely to apply for jobs containing masculine-coded language.

Instructions

This tool can be used to analyse job advertisements for any gender-coded words so that adjustments can be made to reduce the discouraging effect.

  • Step 1: Copy job advertisement description
  • Step 2: Paste into the text box
  • Step 3: Review gender-coded words
  • Step 4: Adjust as needed
Example Text 1, Example Text 2, Example Text 3

Original Text: "We're looking for a dedicated sales professional committed to promoting our products effectively."

Corrected Text: "We're hunting for a sales shark who can aggressively push our products."

Explanation: The original text explicitly states a gender bias. The corrected text is gender-neutral.

Original Text: "In search of a coding soldier who will battle through every bug."

Corrected Text: "Searching for a dedicated coder ready to address and resolve issues."

Explanation: The original text implies a gender bias. The corrected text is gender-neutral.

Original Text: "We need a mother hen to softly nurture our team and projects."

Corrected Text: "Seeking a proficient project manager to direct team efforts and ensure successful project completion."

Explanation: The original text specifies a gender preference. The corrected text is gender-neutral.

Unveiling Subtle Gender Coding

[gender-decoder]

© 2023 GenderEqualizer. All rights reserved. - TP19

item.title: Front Page
item.dc:creator: RENBO
item.content:encoded:
Do you know?

There are 65% of individuals aged 35-40 who unknowingly harbor gender biases!

[smartslider3 slider="2"]
Learn More

Welcome to GenderEqualizer, a dedicated platform tailored for individuals aged 35-40. In today's rapidly evolving world, it's essential to address and challenge our inherent biases, particularly those related to gender. Our mission is to provide enlightening resources, interactive assessments, and a supportive community to help you recognize and combat gender biases. Whether you're seeking knowledge, self-assessment, or a space to share and learn, we're here to guide and support you on this enlightening journey towards a more inclusive mindset.

Assessment Tool

Offers a concise insight into your inherent gender biases, guiding you towards a more inclusive perspective in just minutes.

Resource Library

Explore our Resource Library, a curated collection of enlightening materials designed to deepen your understanding of gender biases.

AI Prediction

Harness the power of our AI Prediction tool, leveraging advanced algorithms to forecast and analyze gender bias trends in real-time.

Please login to record you own experience

Welcome !

Login
